description: Develop and maintain web applications using Python and Flask. Experience with SQL and Git is required. Familiarity with cloud services and testing frameworks is a plus.
Create interactive user interfaces with React and Javascript. Knowledge of CSS, Tailwind, and modern state management is essential. Experience with component-driven development is preferred.
Analyze large datasets and build machine learning models using Scikit-learn and Pandas. Proficiency in NLP, Deep Learning, and data visualization is required.
Automate deployment pipelines and manage cloud infrastructure using AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes. Strong focus on security, scalability, and monitoring.

Build scalable backend systems using Java and Spring Boot. Experience with microservices, distributed systems, and relational databases like PostgreSQL is required. Knowledge of Kafka and Redis is a plus.
Develop end-to-end web applications using the MERN stack. Proficient in React for the frontend and Node.js/Express for the backend. Strong understanding of MongoDB and state management.
Create cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart. Experience with mobile UI/UX, state management with Bloc or Provider, and integrating with RESTful APIs.
Monitor and protect organization's networks and systems from security breaches. Experience with incident response, penetration testing, and knowledge of security protocols and compliance standards.
Design user-centered interfaces and experiences for web and mobile. Proficient in Figma, wirepadding, prototyping, and accessibility standards. Focused on high-fidelity designs and user research.
